long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your web performance monitoring and optimization with the Dentsu Sitespeed Toolkit Chrome extension. Developed by industry experts at Dentsu, this powerful tool empowers developers, designers, and digital marketers to streamline website speed analysis, diagnose performance issues, and accelerate online experiences for users.

Features include:

Hidden Image Inspector: Quickly uncover concealed images embedded within a webpage for thorough content analysis and optimization.

INP Observer: Monitor and analyze Interactive and Network Payload (INP) events in real-time to enhance performance and user experience.

Prune-CSS: Conduct in-depth analysis of CSS stylesheet rules usage to streamline codebase and optimize website performance efficiently.

WhatFonts: Easily identify and examine the fonts applied on a webpage, facilitating precise typography adjustments and design enhancements.
